group_1.textLeft: Hey, did ya hear about what happened@2 years ago?

group_1.textRight: Oh, yeah. An upperclassman told me about it.
It's the biggest buzz in the school right now.

group_1.textLeft: They say the girl who did it got really@bitter about what happened.
So bitter she's trying to curse the whole@school.

group_1.textCenter: Mitama, are you really okay with this?

group_1.textLeft: There's a favor related to that I'd like to@ask, Tsukuyo.

group_1.textRight: Oh, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: I want you to bring my story back to the@halls of Mizuna Girls' Academy.

group_1.textRight: Do you intend to reignite the hearsay all@over again?

group_1.textLeft: If it's to get out, warped by time and added@cruelty...
I'd rather spread it myself.
And since it deals with someone who isn't@at school anymore, it will quickly die out.

group_1.textCenter: Or so they say anyway. I really hope it@is true in this case.
I even added my own embellishment to the@tale.
A rumor's spreading around. And it's about@Mitama!
They say she put a curse on our school.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I have indeed heard that rumor.

group_1.textRight: I heard it too...
Wha?
That's your only reaction?
I thought you'd eat this right up, Ria.
Or at least get a little spooked.

group_1.textLeft: What is there to be spooked by?
Evil spirits? Curses? Please, I'm Ria Ami.
I'd rid the world of all of them in one punch.
She's right, Manaka.
Ria is no weakling!

group_1.textRight: Er...
I don't know how you'd "punch" a curse, but@whatever.
I'm surprised by how you both went dead@silent, though.

group_1.textLeft: Of course we would.

group_1.textRight: Oh, right. You weren't going here when it@happened, Manaka.
No wonder you don't know the details.
Uh, about what?

group_1.textLeft: It would be faster to explain if we had the@magazine article from back then.

group_1.textRight: I think they have the back issues stored in@the AV Room.

group_1.textLeft: My, you're well-informed, Mayu.

group_1.textRight: They keep the art supplies in the same room.@I just noticed by chance!
So if I read the article I'll understand?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...I suppose.

group_1.textRight: Geeze, what's the matter? You've been acting@so weird this whole time!
You're both being all gloomy and vague@about it.
It makes me feel like the only one left in@the dark. You're making me nervous!
So hurry up and show me!

group_1.textLeft: Here, this is the article.

group_1.textRight: So the cause of the curse is written down@here?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't think they wrote anything@about a curse.
But this is the story that started off all@these rumors.

group_1.textRight: All right, then give it here so I can@read it.

group_1.textLeft: Don't come crying to me if you regret@learning about it.
